column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////FOOD: The broth is rich and meaty
column2: I would recommend the pork tonkotsu for the most authentic ramen experience! Their food is extremely consistent in taste and appearance
column3: and I've loved every dish I've tried. Their chashu is not too fatty but super tender
column4: and soft-boiled eggs are to die for. If you're not feeling Ramen
column5: definitely try the chashu pork bowl
column6: and I've heard great things about their vegetarian options.
